subject: Re: [junit] Component Test?
msgSnippet: ... Not personally, but I know his brother Unit Test Tools and his sister Functional Test Tools. You are welcome... In other words, please help us to help you
messageBody:
On Wed, 2004-02-25 at 16:07, Thiago Kuma wrote:
> Someone knows component test tools?
> Thanks.
> Kuma.
>

Not personally, but I know his brother Unit Test Tools and his sister
Functional Test Tools.

You are welcome...

In other words, please help us to help you by asking better questions
with more information, and by all means read the documentation first.

=jason rogers
